name: Chat Room
description: WebSocket driven real-time messaging platform. With profile customisation, Tenor GIF keyboard integration, content moderation and more!

name: Digital Bullet Journal
description: Progressive Web App that aims to capture the user experience of the paper-based "Bullet Journal" planning system digitally.

name: Organic Farm Shop
description: E-commerce platform designed and developed for a fictional organic fruit-and-veg company.

name: To-Do To-Day
description: Simplified to-do list app where you can manage your tasks for the day.

name: Blinkie Maker
description: Old-school blinkie maker with a drag-and-drop editor for creating pixel-themed GIFs.

name: Gift Profile
description: Create a profile to share your gift preferences, clothing sizes and wishlists with your friends and family.
